name: obsidian-deduplicator
description: Scan your vault for duplicate notes and handle them safely.

scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run build:copy
scripts.build: npm run version:patch && npm run build:prod && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:manifest:prod && NODE_ENV=production esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/main.js --external:obsidian --format=cjs
scripts.build:copy: cp dist/main.js main.js && cp dist/manifest.json manifest.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:copy
